date_validation.validation_impact: Using actual ending_balance as file date matches requested date

ai_analysis.selection_reasoning: Matched legal entity containing 'AP WINDSOR CO-INVEST, L.P.', account containing 'Cash Custody', and currency USD; only one entry met all criteria.

date_validation_details.discovery_process: Identified date in column header '2025-09-30 00:00:00' associated with 'Activity Check'
date_validation_details.extraction_method: Used header name as file date; row cell values under this column were numeric activity counts, not relevant to date extraction
date_validation_details.validation_logic: Compared extracted file date 2025-09-30 to requested quarter end date 2025-09-30
date_validation_details.final_decision: Date matches, so ending_balance used as reported
